name: Laser Space
description:
We like to spark new ways of thinking. To do so, we create experiences that surprise and challenge you. Laser Space is a new, elegant puzzle game. You will run through laser-filled rooms, but take your time! You have to think about each step carefully to avoid getting hit.

CHALLENGING PUZZLES
Can you solve all 70 puzzles?

DIFFERENT LASERS
Discover the patterns behind the laser beams to navigate around them.

ELEGANT DESIGN
Lasers are beautiful!

Exclusively available for iOS devices. The game is without ads and without IAP.

Need help, have comments? Contact us at support@codevenient.com.
